title: Slumber Party 1
description: Two eighteen year olds are prepared to do anything to be named valedictorian for their graduating class and their school can't decide which should have the honour. They call in the services of a qualified psychologist to help them pick the most deserving pupil but will the psychologist simply do her job, or will she serve the two of them up on a silver platter for Mr. Banner?
author: Scarlett Skyes
